Full Stack Developer(Remote)

Darmax Global (HongKong)

Yangon, Myanmar

As a Full Stack Developer at Darmax Global, a pioneering startup revolutionizing the domestic helper-employer relationship in Hong Kong, I contributed extensively to both the front-end and back-end aspects of the MyHelper app. Leveraging cutting-edge technologies, I played a pivotal role in developing a solution that transformed how domestic helpers and employers connect and communicate.

Front-End Development:

  • Spearheaded the development of the MyHelper cross-platform app using React Native. Collaborated closely with UI/UX designers to implement intuitive and user-friendly interfaces.
  • Utilized Redux Toolkit for state management, ensuring seamless data flow and efficient updates across the app.
  • Designed and integrated dynamic components using React Navigation to enhance the app's navigation and user experience.

Back-End Development:

  • Implemented Firebase Authentication to ensure secure user registration and login processes, enhancing platform integrity.
  • Designed and maintained the database schema using ERD (Entity-Relationship Diagrams), optimizing data organization and retrieval efficiency.
  • Leveraged MSSQL and PgAdmin for complex data manipulation and storage, supporting the dynamic needs of the platform.

Deployment and Scalability:

Deployed the MyHelper backend services on Heroku, optimizing performance and scalability for growing user demands.

Tech Stack Highlights:

  • React Native
  • Firebase Authentication
  • Redux Toolkit
  • ERD (Entity-Relationship Diagrams)
  • Microsoft SQL Server (MSSQL)
  • PgAdmin
  • Heroku

Achievements:

  • Collaborated with cross-functional teams, including designers and product managers, to iteratively enhance app features based on user feedback.
  • Played a pivotal role in troubleshooting and resolving critical technical issues, maintaining platform stability.

By seamlessly integrating technology and innovation, I helped create a solution that transformed how domestic helpers and employers in Hong Kong connect and communicate.

Full Stack Developer

One Atkhayar Company Limited

Yangon, Myanmar

As a Full Stack Developer at OneAtkhayar, I played a key role in developing ChatChin, a versatile automotive app that integrated car services, maps, and social engagement.

Front-End Development:

  • Utilized Ionic React for a consistent UI across platforms.
  • Integrated Google Maps for real-time navigation and service locations.
  • Enhanced UX with intuitive sections for repair, showrooms, accessories, and batteries.

Back-End Development:

  • Implemented Firebase for secure authentication and data sync.
  • Collaborated on an admin app for accurate service details.
  • Used GitLab for version control and teamwork.

Feature Enhancements:

  • Integrated social media for content sharing and engagement.
  • Designed badge system for user rewards and community building.
  • Added blog section for relevant automotive content.

Tech Stack Highlights:

  • Ionic React
  • Firebase Authentication
  • Google Maps API
  • GitLab Version Control
  • Admin App with Web Scraping
  • Social Media Integration (Facebook)

Achievements:

  • Delivered robust ChatChin app with positive user feedback.
  • Key role in version 2.0.0 launch with social media integration and more.
  • Collaborated across teams for enhanced user satisfaction.

My time at ChatChin was marked by innovation, problem-solving, and a deep passion for the app. I contributed to creating an app that connected car enthusiasts to services and fostered a community.
